version_description: Added support for 10 new languages

- New!: Trophy Showcase! Now any Medal or Badge you earn can be shown off in your Profile!
- New!: You can now earn exclusive Cues by achieving Mastery on all stages!
- New!: We moved Player Stats over to Cues and made Cues more powerful! Spin is now maxed for all players.
- New!: A ton of gameplay improvements - aiming is easier, cues are bigger, balls are shinier.
- And!: A ton of bug fixes and small improvements.

You can reach out to us anytime
kingsofpool@uken.com

Thanks for playing!

New!: We added gorgeous new stage art for every city!
Plus!: Based on your feedback, we made a small change to the aimline thickness. It's now a little thinner!
Plus!: Just a bunch of bug fixes and polish based on your feedback.

You can reach out to us anytime.
kingsofpool@uken.com

Thanks for playing!

Fixed: A rare call pocket bug that blocked the ability to call pockets in some games. Our bad. You can now call all the pockets with confidence!
Plus!: Thanks to some savvy engineering, you should notice a sharp reduction in load times when booting up the game.
Plus!: We added a sheen of polish to the Matchmaking screen!

You can reach out to us anytime.
kingsofpool@uken.com

New: We’ve made the game summary screen cooler, flashier and more impressive.
New: We talking bout Practice in our new Practice Mode! Set up trick shots, rewind and fast forward to replay your best shots!
Plus: Medals now have XP! Gain rank faster by pulling off better, harder shots.
And: A bunch of fixes and polish based on your feedback!

You can reach out to us anytime.
kingsofpool@uken.com

New: We’ve made the game summary screen cooler, flashier and more impressive.
New: We talking bout Practice in our new Practice Mode! Set up trick shots, rewind and fast forward to replay your best shots!
Plus: Medals now have XP! Gain rank faster by pulling off better, harder shots.
And: A bunch of fixes and polish based on your feedback!

You can reach out to us anytime.
kingsofpool@uken.com

New: Custom Challenges are here! You can now set a custom bet size and custom rule sets! Go big or go home.
New: You will be notified when you miss a challenge or a Friend comes online.
New: Gold can now be used to buy exclusive Cash Cases! Join a Club and share the wealth!
Also: Clubs can now have 25 members!
Plus: A bunch of fixes and polish based on your feedback.

Reach out to us anytime:
kingsofpool@uken.com

New: Stat Trophies! Show off your Games Won, Cash Won, Win Streak and more in your Player Profile.
New: Improvements to Club Battles! New exciting Battle screen, and easier ways of finding the best Clubs to join!
Fixed: Rare case where some players were not receiving Club Battle winnings.
Fixed: Arabic translation error has been addressed.
Fixed: Cleared up some rare cases where it was hard to Challenge a friend.
Changed: Challenges no longer contribute to Club Battle winning totals unless you play against a player in the opposing Club.
Added: Battery saving options on the Settings screen.
Added: If you would like to block a player from communicating with you, you can now do so from that player’s profile. You can still find blocked players through search and in matchmaking, though challenges and chat messages will no longer be received from that player.

As always, included are a ton of small fixes and polish based on your feedback.

If you are enjoying Kings of Pool please leave a rating, or tell a friend!

Reach out to us anytime:
kingsofpool@uken.com

You can now disable chat, and in turn, enable chat, whenever you like.
Removed restrictive foul condition when potting opponent balls when playing Call Pockets matches.
You da real VIP! Earn VIP points on every purchase to increase payouts on future purchases, Spin & Win and Cash Cases!
Fixed very rare bug where the 8Ball would disappear after being potted on the break shot.

And as always, a ton of fixes and polish based on your feedback.

Reach out to us anytime!
kingsofpool@uken.com

Keep an eye out for Special Events, coming soon!
New Medal! Get Knockout Medals by taking most of your opponent’s cash!
Quicky Medal requirement now more straight forward. Win the game in under 3 minutes!
Toggle Cue Effects and Table Decals on the Settings screen.
Performance improvements.

You can reach out to us anytime:
kingsofpool@uken.com

Keep an eye out for Special Events, coming soon!
New Medal! Get Knockout Medals by taking most of your opponent’s cash!
Quicky Medal requirement now more straight forward. Win the game in under 3 minutes!
Toggle Cue Effects and Table Decals on the Settings screen.
Performance improvements.
Fixed an issue with accepting club invites

You can reach out to us anytime:
kingsofpool@uken.com

You can now swap Cues during the game!
Double Prize is now Ante Up! Earn the new Medal!
Skill Ranking has been updated to more accurately track your progress
Improved game view for Tablets
Fixed an issue where sound settings reset after playing a match
This update contains a ton of memory optimizations to ensure the game runs smoothly and reliably

Reach out to us anytime!
kingsofpool@uken.com

- Fixed an issue where player profile pictures would sometimes not appear correctly.
- Added an option to disable interstitial ads in the settings. Ads are important to support Kings of Pool, but we know that some people would prefer to disable them and we want to extend that ability to all players, not just players who spend.
- Fixed an issue with certain hats getting twisted on Scratch's head
- Fixed cue sorting issue

Introducing new Scratch Variants!
We've added over 10 variants of Scratch to the game including Kings, Vikings and a solid gold version of our robot buddy.
iOS users will be getting a free exclusive Newton Variant for Scratch for free
Optimized for iPhone X

PLAY vs AI in AR
It's lonely out there in AR, but we've built a friend to play against!
Challenge "Scratch" our new Poolbot to a game of 8-ball in Augmented Reality.

9-BALL TOURNAMENT
We’re launching a brand new 9-ball stage the Lotus Lounge.

3 NEW SPECIAL CUES
We're excited to introduce 3 new special effects cues. The Tesla cue super-charges balls with electricity, the Photon cue will light up the game with bright trail effects, and our smoke cue leaves vapor trails as balls bounce around the table.

PLAY vs AI in AR
It's lonely out there in AR, but we've built a friend to play against!
Challenge "Scratch" our new Poolbot to a game of 8-ball in Augmented Reality.

9-BALL TOURNAMENT
We’re launching a brand new 9-ball stage the Lotus Lounge.

3 NEW SPECIAL CUES
We're excited to introduce 3 new special effects cues. The Tesla cue super-charges balls with electricity, the Photon cue will light up the game with bright trail effects, and our smoke cue leaves vapor trails as balls bounce around the table.
- Added ability for users to submit data removal request in-game

CUE CHALK
Players can now customize their gameplay by choosing for a selection of 4 new cue chalks.

OPTIMIZATIONS
We've squashed some bugs and profiled our way to an even smoother experience.

CUE CHALK
Players can now customize their gameplay by choosing for a selection of 4 new cue chalks.

OPTIMIZATIONS
We've squashed some bugs and profiled our way to an even smoother experience.

BUG FIXES
Fixed an issue where ball spin was set incorrectly.
- Fixed an issue where players that unintentionally limited players maximum top spin and back spin values

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER IN AUGMENTED REALITY
Players can compete over WiFi or blue tooth
Supports spectators
(Requires iOS 12)

HAPTIC FEEDBACK
We've added haptic feedback to powerful shots and ball collisions

ACCESSIBILITY IMPROVEMENTS
Based on feedback from Colorblind players we've made a few alterations to ball color choices.

RADIOACTIVE CUE
Try out the new nulcear powered cue

Introducing The Spectre cue!
This new cue will haunt your opponents with spooky ghost trail and pocket effects.
Updated support for the new iPad Pro

Introducing new Scratch Variants!
We've added over 10 variants of Scratch to the game including Kings, Vikings and a solid gold version of our robot buddy.
iOS users will be getting a free exclusive Newton Variant for Scratch for free

- Fixed an issue where player profile pictures would sometimes not appear correctly.
- Added an option to disable interstitial ads in the settings. Ads are important to support Kings of Pool, but we know that some people would prefer to disable them and we want to extend that ability to all players, not just players who spend.
- Fixed an issue with certain hats getting twisted on Scratch's head
- Fixed cue sorting issue
